name: pi_screen_setup
description: Comprehensive display configuration for Raspberry Pi including HDMI, DSI, DPI, and Composite outputs with KMS/DRM support.
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Configure display outputs on Raspberry Pi devices. Supports HDMI (single and dual), DSI displays (official 7-inch and third-party), DPI/GPIO displays, and Composite output. Features include display presets for popular screens (Waveshare, Elecrow), rotation, KMS/CMA configuration, and automatic migration from existing display settings.
volumio_info.changelog: 0.7.3: Preset Manager i18n - full internationalization support (134 translation keys), language detection via Volumio sharedVars, all 6 languages (EN/DE/FR/ES/IT/NL)
